summary: This mod adds a cloth looks like Son Goku from Dragon Ball.
descriptionHtml:
Vegeta and Goku in Skyrim - Dragon Ball Z mod by beatbox567
[youtube]S-OFLLdiGEs[/youtube]

Description
===========
This mod adds a cloth looks like Son Goku from Dragon Ball.

How to use:
The costumes are craftable at any tanning rack.
Ingredients:
Goku\'s Outfit
1		Linen wrap
1		Leather strips
1		Dragon Scales

Goku Wig
1		Sabre cat snow pelt

Kamesenryu Outfit
1		Linen wrap
1		Leather strips

or

Open the console, then please type additem code.
player.additem XX001011 1

ItemIDs:
Goku\'s Outfit		XX001011
Goku Wig		        XX001002
Kamesenryu Outfit	XX001005

XX is DBZOutfit.esp\'s load order.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Changelog
=========
0.2	-Added female version, a wig, and kamesenryu version.
0.1a	-Fixed the game crash bug, I hope.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
-1st person model isn\'t correct.
-There\'s no specific world/inventory models.
-Some pretty clipping problem.

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Akira Toriyama for creating Dragon Ball.
Thanks to SkyrimNexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don\'t complain to me if it
doesn\'t work or your PC blows up.
author: Backsteppo
